alert.note: Alert for Carroll (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 1:40AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Carroll, northern Tippecanoe and northwestern Clinton Counties through 215 AM EDT... At 140 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Winamac to near Otterbein. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Lafayette around 155 AM EDT. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 169 and 184. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EDT for central, north central and west central Indiana.
